articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Message to Meeting Marking 70th Anniversary of KDWU in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Meeting to Mark 70th Founding Anniversary of Korean Democratic Union in Japan
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Monday sent a congratulatory message to the meeting to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan. 
					 He said that the 70 years covered by the union is the history recorded with the leadership and love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the course of victory reflective of patriotic loyalty and devotion of Korean women in Japan. 
					
					 He extended thanks to elders of the Korean women's movement in Japan, women activists, members of mothers' societies and all other Korean women in Japan who devoted their all to cultivating the flower garden of patriotism and wonderfully bringing up the successors to the patriotic cause of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) while sharing intention and mind with the socialist country. 
					
					 The union is the largest mass organization of Chongryon representative of the rights and interests of all the Korean women in Japan and they are a powerful patriotic force pushing one of the two wheels of the chariot of the movement of Koreans in Japan, he said.
					
					 The officials and women of the union should firmly defend and glorify long the ideology of the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu on the Juche-oriented overseas Korean women's movement and their exploits and dynamically advance the movement of Korean women in Japan along the orbit of Juche indicated by them, he stressed.
					
					 Though they are in alien land, the Korean women in Japan should bear in mind Kim Jong Il's patriotism, make tangible contributions to achieving the independent reunification of the country and building a socialist powerful nation and further strengthen the bonds of friendship with the world progressive women including the Japanese women valuing justice and truth, he pointed out.
					
					 He said that he would devote his kindred feelings to strengthening the women's union and to ensuring the dignity and happiness of the Korean women in Japan with the same trust and loving care with which President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il valued and put forward the union.

articles.title: Greetings to Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ugandan President
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Monday sent a message of greeting to Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of the Republic of Uganda, on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: TASS Delegation Here
articles.content:
TASS Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Russia's TASS led by Director General Sergei Mikhailov arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Great Leaders
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Great Leaders
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here Monday on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 She laid a floral basket at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The family of Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the 72nd birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was laid at the statues on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreigners
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on Monday received floral baskets from the secretary general of the African National Congress of South Africa, the Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association of Japan and the family of Zhang Wei-hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Earlier, a floral basket came to him from the chairman of the South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK and its 72nd birthday.

articles.title: Public Presentation by Winners of Schoolchildren's Art Individual Contest
articles.content:
Public Presentation by Winners of Schoolchildren's Art Individual Contest
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A public presentation by winners of the 12th schoolchildren's art individual contest took place at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday to celebrate the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Put on the stage were female solo "Thank You, Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party and ushering in a new history of loving care for posterity on this land.
					
					 Kayagum solo "My Country, the Best in the World" and other pieces portrayed the appearance of schoolchildren growing up to be pillars of prosperous Korea.
					
					 Such numbers as quintet "Marshal Is Our Happiness and Future" and harmonica solo "Serial of Revolutionary Songs" represented the will of the schoolchildren to become young guards and children revolutionaries boundlessly faithful to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK Revered from Abroad
articles.content:
WPK Revered from Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is getting worldwide boundless respect and praise for having advanced along the road of independence, Songun (military-first) and socialism while enjoying absolute support and trust from the popular masses without making any slightest mistake or deviation in shaping its line for over 70 years.
					 The WPK representing the interests of the Korean working people was founded on October 10, 1945, the head of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said, and went on:.
					
					 The history of the world revolutionary movement knows no party, but the WPK which has won victories one after another in the vortex of troublous history.
					
					 The history of its foundation and struggle clearly shows what kind of party the world people should found and what they should do to materialize the national demand and interests.
					
					 Lalkar, the organ of the Communist Party of Great Britain (MarxistÔºçLeninist), in an article said that the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War and have made such great progress in all fields of society as realization of socialist industrialization and enforcement of free education and health care system over the past 70 years under the leadership of the WPK, despite of innumerable difficulty and challenge like the U.S. persistent nuclear threat and blackmail and economic sanctions, a series of natural disasters, collapse of socialism in the former Soviet Union and East European countries.
					
					 All their achievements are entirely attributable to the leadership of the WPK which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il and is being guided by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, founded the WPK, a revolutionary party of the popular masses for the first time in history.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, devoted his all to strengthening the WPK into the one of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The glorious history of the WPK would have been unthinkable without the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK will reliably perform its mission and role as the general staff of the Korean revolution and lead the Korean people to the final victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is adding glory to the WPK as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan against Going Reckless with Backing of U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan against Going Reckless with Backing of U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Japan air "self-defense force" staged PAC-3 interceptor missile mobile deployment drill in Nahashi, Okinawa and made it to public. Earlier, the Japan defense minister Onodera visited the ground deployment interceptor missile unit stationed in Hokkaido where he urged the need to maintain full-combat readiness. In the meantime, escort ship Sazanami of Japan's maritime "self-defense force" staged a joint military drill with the U.S. nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan in waters off Okinawa.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says the Japanese reactionaries' moves to stage a comeback under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK has gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seriously mistaken, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Should Japan take the advantages of the U.S. war racket, they can not but be a target of the powerful strike means of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Japan can never be safe if a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula. Everything in Japan mobilized for the war can be destroyed to pieces, to say nothing of the U.S. aggression bases there.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are strongly warned that if they go reckless with the backing of the U.S., they can bring irrevocable misfortune to the Japanese archipelago.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Confrontation Farce Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Confrontation Farce Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Monday carry commentaries as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet forces staged the farce "commemoration of day of ROK" where they opened to public "Hyunmu" missile and whipped up the extreme confrontation while calling for "defence reform" and "strong punishment of the north's provocation".
					 Rodong Sinmun brands this as a despicable farce to cover up the traitorous nature of the ROK army, a colonial mercenary army serving the U.S., encourage the soldiers whose spirit runs low and calm down the internal security fear and war-phobia.
					
					 It is enough to make a cat laugh for the puppet forces to think of browbeating the DPRK with such things like "Hyunmu", the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 Not content with collecting at random scrap iron-like weapons disposed of by their master, the puppet forces made their own, imitating their master's but they only caused accidents to face shame. This is the deplorable plight of the puppet forces. It was just shortly ago that "Hyunmu" missile which the puppet military fired while calling for "coping" with the DPRK's measures for bolstering the nuclear deterrence for self-defence crashed into the sea.
					
					 The same is the case with the "defence reform" trumpeted about by the puppet forces.
					
					 The "defence reform" is just a showy trinket even though the puppet forces claim it is for "independence" and "military edge". It is unbecoming for the puppet forces to call for "defence reform" as they have left the military commanding right to the tender mercy of their American master and ask the U.S. to ensure their security.
					
					 Minju Joson says the ridiculous farce of the puppet forces only provokes derision and censure of people and will only bring earlier the miserable end of the imbeciles going helter-skelter just like a puppy fearless of a tiger.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Aims Sought by S. Korean Puppet Forces in Talking about "North's Additional Provocation"
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Aims Sought by S. Korean Puppet Forces in Talking about "North's Additional Provocation"
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- With the approach of Chusok (Harvest Moon Day), brass hats of the south Korean puppet military inspected five islands in the West Sea of Korea under the pretext of inspecting the "military operational preparedness in the waters off the frontline", while clamoring about "the north's provocation".
					 Earlier, the puppet forces staged a farce of boosting the defense budget under the pretext of "rapidly increasing nuclear and missile threats from the north."
					
					 Minju Joson Monday says in a commentary that this is nothing but trite sophism of the confrontation maniacs to paint the DPRK as a harasser of peace.
					
					 The commentary continues:
					
					 The puppet forces, who have resorted to the sanctions and pressure on the fellow countrymen in the north so far in pursuance of the U.S. policy, let out such sophism in a sinister attempt to cover up their confrontation nature and justify the scheme for invasion of the north.
					
					 As for the provocations, it is the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces that ratcheted up the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Their oft-repeated talk about the north's "additional provocation" only reveals their sinister scenario to attain the ambition for "unifying the social system" without fail by zealously toeing the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces have neither capability to match the muscle of the People's Army nor courage to meet the ensuing consequences. They would be well advised to behave themselves if they are to stay longer.

articles.title: Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK Are War Acts: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK Are War Acts: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Sophism describing the U.S. frantic sanctions and pressure on the DPRK that have reached the extremes as "peaceful and diplomatic" solution is widespread in the international arena. 
					 The state and defense secretaries, the national security adviser of the White House, the ambassador to the UN and other U.S. government authorities are justifying the U.S. anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure as peaceful and diplomatic actions, while claiming before the international community that "the diplomatic solution to the nuclear issue of the DPRK is a goal" and "sanctions and pressure are the best option for peaceful solution".
					
					 This is the height of Yankee-style impudence and sheer sophism.
					
					 As universally recognized, the "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK which the U.S. imperialists and their followers cooked up in succession by abusing the UN are a hideous economic terrorist act which totally blockaded levers directly linked with the people's livelihood, to say nothing of external economic relations of the country.
					
					 The U.S. ferocious unilateral sanctions moves aimed at ordinary economic and trade activities of companies of other countries having dealings with the DPRK and its pressure to cut off diplomatic relations with the DPRK have aroused serious concern and rebuff of the international community.
					
					 The political and economic sanctions and pressure moves aimed to totally stamp out the sovereignty and the rights to existence and development of a sovereign state are little short of an act of military aggression and war as they are the execution of the barbarous and unethical DPRK policy pursued by the U.S. chief executive crying out for total destruction of the DPRK.
					
					 The London Treaty on definition of aggression and the UN General Assembly resolution 3314 and a series of international treaties and resolutions clearly stipulate it as an act of aggression and a breach of international law to encroach upon the sovereignty and the economic independence of other countries and to take steps of putting economic pressure for threatening the basic economic line of a country and to mount economic blockade against other countries.
					
					 The description of the racket of sanctions against the DPRK as "peaceful and diplomatic solution" is a deception to cover up their illegal act tantamount to a war crime and lead other countries to "cooperation" and an open mockery of the international community.
					
					 Senior researcher of Oxford University Tom in an article contributed to homepage of the institute for U.S. policy studies on September 25 said that one can not but be skeptical about the existence of anything like diplomacy in U.S. administration, stressing there are nothing more than Trump's repeated bluff like "fire and fury" and "total destruction" and Haley's frantic and ear-rending threat at the UN Security Council.
					
					 The U.S. vicious attempt to blockade the DPRK in all directions, strangle the economy of the country, destroy the people's livelihood and force the DPRK to disarm itself and put the country under its control with the nuclear weapons can never be realized.
					
					 The DPRK has in its possession everything it can including nuclear weapons. It will be a serious miscalculation to think that the DPRK will just remain cross-armed in the face of the increasing threat of aggression and war and sanctions and pressure moves of the U.S. and the hostile forces.
					
					 The moves for putting sanctions and pressure on the DPRK will only arouse the Korean people into action and harden their strong will to settle accounts with the U.S. to put an end to the centuries-old confrontation with it.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK for self-defence built with much effort will keep to the path of justice to defend the sovereignty and the rights to existence and development of the country.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits S. Korean Authorities' Thoughtless Confrontation Deeds
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits S. Korean Authorities' Thoughtless Confrontation Deeds
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are trumpeting about "dialogue in parallel with enforcement of sanctions and pressure".
					 The chief executive of south Korea, when meeting with representatives of four ruling and opposition parties on September 27, called for "leaving the room of dialogue while putting pressure on the north through cooperation with the U.S." On September 30 and on October 1 he let Chongwadae spokesman and others state that "dialogue is pushed forward together with sanctions and pressure" and "sanctions and pressure do not contradict dialogue and negotiations".
					
					 In his "commemorative speech for marking August 15" earlier, he let out a litany of clumsy explanations that "the goal of sanctions and pressure on the north is to lead it to dialogue, not to tighten military tension".
					
					 This is just senseless rubbish of confrontation-minded lunatics who fail to know how to use words of dialogue and confrontation.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities' "north policy" is an intolerable confrontation-oriented policy which is just a replica of the U.S. policy for putting sanctions and pressure on the north as it calls for "parallel enforcement of dialogue and pressure" under the pretext of the "solution of the north's nuclear issue".
					
					 After the DPRK's H-bomb test, the U.S. rigged up the harshest anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" by setting in motion the UN hand-raising machines. And the south Korean puppet forces "supported and welcomed it", while taking "diverse diplomatic measures" pursuant to the UN "sanctions resolution" and crying out for drafting high-intensity "independent sanctions".
					
					 In the meantime, they begged the American master to lift the restriction on the warhead weight of the ballistic missiles and staged joint military exercises after introducing the nuclear strategic bombers and Stealth fighters of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in a bid to threaten the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces have gone more frantic than before in their moves to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outsiders while describing the "north's nuclear weapons as the greatest challenge" and calling for "putting to use all means like sanctions and pressure" for the "solution of the north's nuclear issue". Yet, they are trumpeting about "dialogue", an expression of the height of impudence.
					
					 The catastrophic situation of the north-south relations is an inevitable product of the racket for confrontation with the fellow countrymen kicked up by the puppet ruling forces keen on putting sanctions and pressure on the DPRK in collusion with outsiders, behind the scene even though they call for "dialogue" outwardly.
					
					 The nuclear issue is the one between the DPRK and the U.S. and it can never see a solution as long as the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the nuclear blackmail and threat continue.
					
					 The nuclear deterrence of the DPRK is not a bargaining chip to be put on any dialogue or negotiating table, and we will never discuss the nuclear issue with the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The present puppet authorities are keen on currying favor with such lunatics as Trump who openly calls for totally destroying the DPRK. It is a pipe dream for them to pursue dialogue and contacts aimed at forcing the DPRK to disarm itself.
					
					 Sanctions and dialogue can never go together.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Hell-bent on Bolstering up Air Force
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Hell-bent on Bolstering up Air Force
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are getting frantic with the moves to bolster up the air force against the north, according to CBS of south Korea on Oct. 6.
					 The trigger-happy forces are planning to purchase 8 F-35A stealth fighters from the U.S. next year and bring this type of aircraft to 40 in all in the future.
					
					 They also decided to deploy four "global hawk" reconnaissance drones for spying the major targets in the DPRK from next year.
					
					  Against this backdrop, they are scheming to increase the flight hours and operational radius of their fighters by purchasing air tankers from European munitions industries.

articles.title: Holidays of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Holidays of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Bangladesh, Russia, Egypt and Ethiopia between September 25 and October 3 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 72nd birthday of the WPK and the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The general secretary of the C.C., Workers' Party of Bangladesh and the president of the Bangladesh People's League noted that the WPK has covered the road of victory and glory for more than 70 years, overcoming the tempest of history.
					
					 The director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that the WPK, founded by President Kim Il Sung, has struggled for happiness of the people and prosperity of the country for many years.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il, elected as general secretary of the WPK on October 8, 1997 in reflection of the unanimous will of all the Korean people, had constantly implemented the lines and policies for the people, the director said, adding:
					
					 Today the WPK is speeding up the struggle to defend socialism and build a powerful state, holding aloft the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said the WPK, which inherited the tradition of the DIU formed by the President, is a Juche-type revolutionary party and vanguard guiding the Korean people in the struggle for the accomplishment of the socialist cause.
					
					 The chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association praised the leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for party building, saying that under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the Korean army and people have dynamically advanced despite the frantic provocative moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 The chairman of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism stressed that the WPK led by Kim Jong Un would further display its might as an invincible party.

articles.title: Brazilians Support DPRK
articles.content:
Brazilians Support DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A demonstration supporting the DPRK was staged outside the U.S. consulate general in Sao Paulo of Brazil on September 30.
					 Taking part in it were figures of the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics and masses from different walks of life.
					
					 The demonstrators condemned the U.S. hostile policy and aggressive threat against the DPRK which is struggling to defend its rights to existence and independent development, holding flags of the DPRK and Brazil and placards carrying such letters as "No imperialist interference in national sovereignty."
					
					 They expressed their opposition to all sorts of anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure and urged the U.S. to opt for detente on the Korean peninsula and conclusion of a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 On the same day, the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics posted the following article on its homepage together with photos showing the demonstration:
					
					 The demonstration focused on the issue of ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has steadily built up the self-defensive military capability to cope with any war.
					
					 We deem it as a primary duty in building a peaceful, just and independent world to struggle against the imperialist aggression.
					
					 The Brazilian people showed through the demonstration that they would never remain an onlooker to the U.S. aggression and war moves being committed in all parts of the world.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- An Uruguayan political party and Italian organizations released solidarity messages on September 23 and 26 to support the just cause of the Korean people.
					 A graver situation is now prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to new war moves, sanctions and threats by warlike and fascist President Trump and the U.S. imperialists, the Revolutionary Communist Party of Uruguay said in its message, adding:
					
					 The heroic Korean people who had already defeated the criminal imperialist beasts will defeat the U.S. imperialists once again with the support of the world people. We affirm that we firmly stand by the side of the Korean people.
					
					 The Italy-DPRK Association for Friendship and Solidarity and the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea of Italy said in their message:
					
					 We fully support the just stand of the DPRK as we know well about the moves of the U.S. imperialists, terrorists and criminals led by clown Trump.
					
					 Though Western media mislead the essence of the situation, it is the U.S. which is chiefly responsible for the escalating tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We will strive to inform the people of the truth.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people would remove the clouds of a nuclear war and win a shining victory under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un just as they weathered all sorts of difficulties and trials under the guidance of the great President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita el 70o aniversario de fundacion de UMDC en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita el 70o aniversario de fundacion de UMDC en Japon
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 9 un mensaje de felicitacion al congreso central por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas Coreanas en Japon.
					En su misiva, el Maximo Dirigente subrayo que los 70 anos recorridos por la UMDC en Japon son la historia de la direccion y el amor del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la trayectoria victoriosa en que estan registradas la fidelidad patriotica y la abnegacion de las mujeres coreanas residentes en Japon.
					
					Dio agradecimiento a las veteranas del movimiento de las coreanas residentes en Japon, las activistas, las integrantes de la Sociedad de Madres y otras mujeres coreanas en Japon, quienes al compartir el proposito y el alma con la patria socialista dedicaron todo lo suyo a los trabajos para cultivar el patriotismo y formar excelentemente a los sucesores de la causa patriotica de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon).
					
					Destaco que la UMDC en Japon es la mayor entidad de masas de la Chongryon, que representa los derechos e intereses de todas las coreanas en Japon, y una fuerza patriotica que se encarga de una rueda del movimiento de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					Enfatizo que las funcionarias de la organizacion y las mujeres coreanas en Japon deben defender con firmeza y llevar adelante para siempre la original idea y las hazanas de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu por el movimiento de las coreanas en ultramar y avanzar con vigor solo por la ruta indicado por los grandes lideres.
					
					Refirio que las mujeres coreanas en Japon, aunque viven en ultramar, deben guardar en el corazon el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y contribuir de manera especifica a la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la construccion de la potencia socialista, asi como estrechar mas los lazos de amistad con las mujeres japonesas y otras progresistas del mundo que aprecian la justicia y la verdad.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y confianza de que llevandose la confianza y el amor de los lideres antecedentes a la UMDC en Japon, dedicara el amor y el alma consanguineos para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la union y la dignidad y la felicidad de las mujeres coreanas en Japon.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita el 55o aniversario de independencia de Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita el 55o aniversario de independencia de Uganda
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 9 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente ugandes Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, con motivo del 55o aniversario de la independencia de este pais africano. 
					El remitente expreso la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: ACNC comenta "impulso simultaneo de sancion y presion y dialogo" de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta "impulso simultaneo de sancion y presion y dialogo" de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Las autoridades surcoreanas no cesan de hablar del "impulso simultaneo de sancion y presion y dialogo".
					En un encuentro con los representantes de los 4 partidos en poder y oposicion, sostenido el 27 de septiembre, el mandatario surcoreano chismeo que "hay que presionar el Norte de Corea junto con EE.UU., pero, dar margen para el dialogo". El 30 de septiembre y el primero de octubre, disparateo por conducto del vocero de Chongwadae que "promueve el dialogo ademas de las sanciones y presion" y que "las sanciones y presion no son contradictorias al dialogo y negociaciones".
					
					Con anterioridad, en su "discurso de felicitacion por el 15 de agosto", el gobernante surcoreano parloteo que el "objetivo de imponer al Norte de Corea las sanciones y presion duras no es para agudizar la tension militar, sino para inducir al Norte al dialogo".
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una picoteria de maniaco conflictivo que no sabe emplear las expresiones tales como dialogo y confrontacion.
					
					La "politica sobre el Norte de Corea" de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas consisten en "impulsar simultaneamente el dialogo y la represion" anteponiendo la "solucion del problema nuclear del Norte". Francamente dicho es una imperdonable politica de enfrentamiento, siendo una imitacion de la politica de sanciones y presion anti-RPDC trazada por EE.UU.
					
					Tan pronto como EE.UU. fabricara la inaudita "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC movilizando los mecanismos de votacion de la ONU despues del ensayo de la bomba H de la RPDC, los titeres la aplaudieron usando las palabras como "apoyo" y "bienvenida" y solto que tomaran las "medidas diplomaticas de diversas formas" en virtud de la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU y prepararan el "proyecto de sancion independiente" dura.
					
					Ademas, mendigaron a su amo gringo la cancelacion del limite de peso de ojiva de sus misiles balisticos y trataron de amenazar a la RPDC desarrollando los simulacros militares conjuntos al introducir los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares y los cazas de tipo Stealth de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas.
					
					Son muy descaros los titeres surcoreanos que insisten obstinadamente en el "dialogo", por una parte y por la otra recurren mas freneticamente que nunca a la campana represiva anti-RPDC en connivencia con las fuerzas ajenas, diciendo que "el mas gran desafio es las armas nucleares del Norte de Corea" y que se valdran de las sanciones, presion y los demas medios" para "solucionar el problema nuclear del Norte de Corea".
					
					La realidad catastrofica de las relaciones intercoreanas es el producto inevitable de los alborotos de confrontacion fratricida de las actuales fuerzas en poder que bajo la cortina del "dialogo", recrudecen las sanciones y aplastamiento anti-RPDC junto con las fuerzas ajenas.
					
					El problema nuclear es un asunto entre la RPDC y EE.UU y no se resolvera jamas mientras que se perdura la politica hostil a la RPDC y el chantaje y amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					El disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC no es el objeto de regateo para el dialogo o negociaciones. Y la RPDC no tiene la necesidad de discutir este problema con los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Las vigentes autoridades surcoreanas se apresuran por congraciarse con el viejo maniaco Trump que solto abiertamente las palabras violentas como la extincion de la RPDC, por una parte y por la otra, persiguen el dialogo y el contacto cuyo objetivo es el desarme nuclear de su connacional, lo que es una ilusion nunca realizable.
					
					Son incompatibles las sanciones y el dialogo.

articles.title: ACNC califica de accion de guerra la sancion y presion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC califica de accion de guerra la sancion y presion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ahora, llega al climax la campana de sancion y presion de Estados Unidos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					En tales circunstancias, se difunde un sofisma, que la describe como solucion "pacifica" y "diplomatica", enganando la opinion publica mundial.
					
					Los secretarios de Estado y de Defensa, el asesor de Seguridad Nacional de la Casa Blanca, la embajadora ante la ONU y otras autoridades gubernamentales de EE.UU. justifican la campana de sancion y aplastamiento anti-RPDC como una accion pacifica y diplomatica diciendo que "la meta es la solucion diplomatica del problema nuclear de Corea" y "la mejor oportunidad para la solucion pacifica esta en la sancion y presion". 
					
					Esto es una sofisteria que muestra el cinismo al estilo yanqui.
					
					Como reconoce todo el mundo, las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC, fabricadas seguidamente por EE.UU. y sus seguidores abusando del nombre de la ONU, resultan un brutal acto de terrorismo economico para bloquear totalmente las relaciones economicas exteriores de la RPDC y todos los espacios relacionados directamente con la vida del pueblo coreano. 
					
					 La sancion independiente de EE.UU. sobre las normales actividades economicas y comerciales de otros paises con la RPDC y su mandato de romper las relaciones diplomaticas con la segunda provocan gran preocupacion y rechazo de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					La sancion y presion politicas y economicas encaminadas a acabar con la soberania y los derechos a la subsistencia y al desarrollo del Estado soberano forman parte de la implementacion de la politica de hostilidad del gobernante estadounidense que habla de la "exterminio de la poblacion norcoreana" y significan la accion de guerra de agresion militar. 
					
					El Tratado de Londres sobre la Definicion de Agresion, la resolucion no. 3314 de la Asamblea General de la ONU y otros pactos y resoluciones internacionales estipulan que la violacion de la soberania y la independencia economica de otros paises y las medidas de presion economica, que amenazan la base de las arterias de economia nacional, el bloqueo economico contra otros paises, etc. resultan acciones de agresion y violacion de la ley internacional. 
					
					El proceder de EE.UU., que describe el alboroto de sancion anti-RPDC como una medida para la "paz" y "solucion diplomatica", deviene una abierta burla y engano a la sociedad internacional para ocultar sus actos ilicitos correspondientes al crimen de guerra y conseguir la "colaboracion" de otros paises. 
					
					El investigador superior de la Universidad de Oxford de Gran Bretana, Tom, escribio en su articulo insertado el 25 de septiembre en la pagina Web del instituto de la politica de Estados Unidos que tiene duda sobre la posibilidad de decir algo "diplomatico" en la actual administracion norteamericana.
					
					Agrego que no hay nada mas que las repetidas palabras violentas de Trump como "llamas y furia" y "destruccion total" y el discurso fanatico y virulento de Nikki Haley pronunciado en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					No se realizara nunca el intento criminal de EE.UU. de sofocar la economia nacional en su conjunto de la RPDC y destruir la vida del pueblo mediante el bloqueo total y a la larga, desarmarla y derrocarla con armas nucleares. 
					
					La RPDC consiguio todo lo necesario, incluso el arma nuclear. 
					
					Pues, seria un gran error si EE.UU. piensa que la RPDC sufriria con brazos cruzados la amenaza de guerra de agresion del imperio yanqui y otras fuerzas hostiles y su creciente campana de sancion y presion.
					
					Esta campana hace al pueblo coreano multiplicar la voluntad de acabar con la confrontacion antiyanqui que perdura siglo tras siglo. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa de la RPDC, preparadas a un precio muy caro, marcharan sin vacilacion alguna por la senda de defensa de la soberania nacional y de los derechos a la subsistencia y al desarrollo del pais.
